body_html: Thank you. I guess this solves my problem. Still, wouldn't it be possible to statically analyze the dependencies of a tf.cond node? I mean isn't the feasibility of such optimizations the advantage of defining computations symbolically/declaratively in TensorFlow?

body: Thank you. I guess this solves my problem. Still, wouldn't it be possible to statically analyze the dependencies of a `tf.cond` node? I mean isn't the feasibility of such optimizations the advantage of defining computations symbolically/declaratively in TensorFlow?
